title: Short-Term Course for Creativity-Based Mathematics Instructional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education experience and secondary-level or higher academic background
context.additional_context: Mobile learning via smartphones targeting accessibility limitations, aiming to innovate math education through creative instructional methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more mathematics problem-solving activities by applying creativity-based instructional methods
Learners can develop one mathematics education content piece using team-based idea generation techniques in a mobile environment
Learners can provide peer feedback on two or more mathematics lesson cases from fellow instructors using a creativity assessment rubric

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
